name: Today?
description:
(Updated on 1/17/2020)

Hello!

Today? is an app I'm working on in Unity, that changes based on the date and time. As of right now, its basically a limited clock with one mini game. I plan to try experimenting with different ideas when adding things to it, and plan to add more and more to it throughout the year. My goals are to add more mini games and functionality to it.

Current mini games:

  • Space Explorer
